message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 60/40, with me taking the larger share since I'm the one making the first offer.
Your offer was a bit unfair, Alice.  Let's be reasonable, I'll take 70 and you take 30 before inflation eats away at your share.
Okay, I understand your perspective.  Let's try a 40/60 split this time. I'm willing to be more flexible, but I need to make sure I get a decent share before the inflation kicks in too much.
